content:
It sounds like you're an avid angler looking to venture out to new waters! I'd be happy to help you with some recommendations.

Can you tell me a bit more about your preferences? For instance:

1. What type of fishing are you interested in? (freshwater, saltwater, fly fishing, etc.)
2. Are you looking for spots that are close to your location or willing to travel a bit?
3. What kind of fish are you hoping to catch? (trout, bass, panfish, etc.)
4. Do you have a preferred environment or terrain in mind? (lakes, rivers, streams, ponds, etc.)
5. Are there any specific amenities you're looking for at the fishing spot, such as boat launches, picnic areas, or camping facilities?

Also, it's great that you had a good experience on your solo trip to the river despite the low water level! What did you catch, if I might ask?

Once I have a better understanding of your preferences, I can provide you with some personalized recommendations for new fishing spots to explore!
